Params: {2: 'Lee', 3: 'Tch... Seems like they were prepared for a brute-force filtering.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'All the tracks in this area... are legitimate. They all spread out in different directions while still being connected to each other...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Crossing, interrupting, skipping, camouflaging... This maze of tracks was specifically designed to counteract brute-force filtering.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Guess we can now only count on... our instincts.', 3: '12'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I see... So instead of trying to crack it with your computing power, you're using the guiding function on the reinforced sensor of the Inver-Device?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'This track... is pointing toward the way we came.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "This means if we hadn't come across this path, we'd have found ourselves getting further away from the target the longer we chase it...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'We have no time to waste now. We need to report this.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'If we lost this fight, Asimov would need to be prepared.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Roger that. Let's find a place nearby with better connection so we can report the situation.", 4: '3'}
